GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL_INSTRUCTIONS.instruction: Fill this form in BLACK INK and CAPITAL LETTERS only. Ensure all mandatory fields are completed.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters

APP_DATE.title: Application Date
APP_DATE.instruction: Enter the date of submission in DD-MM-YYYY format.

CUST_ID.title: Customer ID
CUST_ID.instruction: If you already have a Customer ID with IDFC Bank, enter it here. Otherwise, leave blank.

CKYC_NO.title: CKYC Number
CKYC_NO.instruction: If you have a Central KYC (CKYC) number, enter it here to link your records.

PERSONAL_DETAILS.title: Personal Details
PERSONAL_DETAILS.instruction: Enter your Full Name (as per ID proof), Date of Birth, Gender, and Marital Status.

BIRTH_DETAILS.title: Place & Country of Birth
BIRTH_DETAILS.instruction: Enter the City and Country where you were born.

FATCA_TAX_RESIDENCY.title: Tax Residency (FATCA)
FATCA_TAX_RESIDENCY.instruction: Fill this ONLY if you pay taxes in a country other than India. Enter the Country of Tax Residence and your Tax ID Number (TIN).
rejections: Tax resident of foreign country but TIN missing

FAMILY_DETAILS.title: Family Details
FAMILY_DETAILS.instruction: Provide at least ONE name: Father's Name, Spouse's Name, or Mother's Name.
rejections: All family name fields left blank

IDENTITY_DOCS.title: Identity Documents
IDENTITY_DOCS.instruction:
Enter details of the ID proof you are submitting (e.g., Aadhaar, Voter ID, Passport). 
Mandatory: You MUST provide a PAN. If you do not have a PAN, you must attach 'Form 60'.
rejections: PAN missing and Form 60 not indicated

PERMANENT_ADDRESS.title: Permanent Address
PERMANENT_ADDRESS.instruction: Enter your address exactly as it appears on your Officially Valid Document (OVD) (e.g., Aadhaar/Passport). Tick the box for the document attached.
rejections: Address does not match attached proof

CURRENT_ADDRESS.title: Current / Mailing Address
CURRENT_ADDRESS.instruction: If your current address is different from your permanent address, fill this section. You must attach a 'Deemed OVD' (like a utility bill) as proof. If it is the same, tick 'Same as Above'.
rejections: Address different but proof not attached
Address details missing when 'Same as Above' is unchecked

OVERSEAS_ADDRESS.title: Overseas Jurisdiction Address
OVERSEAS_ADDRESS.instruction: REQUIRED ONLY FOR FOREIGN TAX RESIDENTS. Enter your address in the foreign country.
rejections: Tax resident of foreign country but overseas address missing

CONTACT_DETAILS.title: Contact Details
CONTACT_DETAILS.instruction: Enter your Mobile Number and Email ID for bank communication.

OCCUPATION_INFO.title: Occupation Details
OCCUPATION_INFO.instruction: Tick your Occupation type (e.g., Salaried, Self-Employed, Student). If Salaried, write your Company Name.
rejections: Company name missing for Salaried applicant

INCOME_INFO.title: Income Details
INCOME_INFO.instruction: Select your Source of Income (e.g., Salary, Business) and your Gross Annual Income range.

PEP_DECLARATION.title: Politically Exposed Person (PEP)
PEP_DECLARATION.instruction: Tick 'Yes' if you are a Politically Exposed Person (e.g., Senior Politician, Govt Official) or related to one. Otherwise, tick 'No'.

MARKETING_CONSENT.title: Marketing Consent
MARKETING_CONSENT.instruction: Select 'Yes' or 'No' to indicate if you want the bank to contact you for offers and products.

SIGNATURE_PHOTO.title: Signature & Photograph
SIGNATURE_PHOTO.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph. Sign ACROSS the photograph and in the signature box below.

WITNESS_DETAILS.title: Witness Details
WITNESS_DETAILS.instruction: REQUIRED ONLY IF THUMB IMPRESSION IS USED. Two witnesses must sign and provide their details.
rejections: Thumb impression used but witness missing

BANK_USE_ONLY.title: For Bank Use Only
BANK_USE_ONLY.instruction: To be completed by bank officials for KYC verification, branch details, employee certification, and checker confirmation.
